reference.shortdesc: The lcOpenQuestion element was deprecated in DITA version 1.3. It was replaced with the lcOpenQuestion2 element. It was originally intended to pose an open-ended question in an assessment interaction.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <!--Open Question sample --> <lcOpenQuestion id="oq1"> <title>Cows and moon jumps</title> <lcQuestion>Describe how it might be possible for a cow to jump over the moon.</lcQuestion> <lcOpenAnswer>Cows can only jump over the moon in nursery rhymes.</lcOpenAnswer> </lcOpenQuestion>
